p: Through molecular analyses, we obtained an overall prevalence of CCoV of 32.3 %. CCoV RNA was detected in all three families. Thirteen C. lupus (31.0 %; Table 2) tested positive in the spleen and four V. vulpes (33.3 %; Table 2) in the spleen and small intestine. Positive results were also found in the two G. genetta and the single L. lutra, both in the rectum ( Table 2).
